title: GO SMS Pro Happy Farm Theme
creator: Themes Architect

extendedInfo.description: Application to send SMS messages with cute pets in the household. The app includes cute cartoonish animals on the farm. Wallpaper of the main menu is sweet text messages lamb in a meadow next to the house hosts a large cloud in the sky. Text messages in the main menu are brown. Text messages from friends have a theme from the cloud. Each window contains a text message in the upper corner of the theme with pet sitting on a cloud. Background text messages that dog in the meadow and the house. Other elements are white. Background window is a text message is blue, the text and the sender's name in red. In this window, there is a bit of a farm, the lamb and Cottage. Next to the name of the sender is a theme of a cloud, the other lements are red and white. If you like fairy tales, cartoons and drawings, and animals this app is for you, with our Launcher with the same motive and lock you need sms sending application to your phone and then mastered cute cartoonish animals of the farm.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:- background shows cute sheep and dog- changed messages frames, when you write sms frame contains little lamb in corner, received messages has little dog - pop up window have farm motiveHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Happy Farm Theme for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Happy Farm Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
